00001 //  AABH.h
00002 //  Header file for the AABB class
00003 //  Dynamic Array used to store the co-ordinates of the bounding boxes used for collsion 
00004 //  detection.  The array is only used initially before being copied into AABB Linked Lists.
00005 //  The array is then terminated.
00006 //  
00007 //  I created this class originally before using linked lists to store the BB info. But decided
00008 //  to keep it has the stored data can be easily copied across into different linked lists
00009 //  in any prefered order. (i.e. the data is copied into across into linked lists for different
00010 //  quadrants)
00011 //
00012 //  Shay Leary, March 2005
00013 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 
00015 #ifndef AABB_H
00016 #define AABB_H
00017 
00018 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 #include <gl/glut.h>
00023 //#include <GL/freeglut.h>
00024 
00025 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 class AABB
00028 {
00029 private:
00030         // stores x,y,z co-ordinates
00031         struct XYZ 
00032         { 
00033                 GLdouble x, y, z; 
00034         }; 
00035         // stores max and min values of co-ordinates
00036         struct BoundingBox 
00037         { 
00038                 XYZ max; 
00039                 XYZ min; 
00040         }; 
00041         // dynamic array to store info
00042         BoundingBox *m_BBox;
00043         // number of BB created (i.e. array size)
00044         int m_NoOfBoxes;
00045         // deletes arrays and clears memory
00046         void ClearBB (BoundingBox* &tempArray);
00047 
00048         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 
00050     // Privatised copy constructor and assignment operator
00051     AABB (const AABB &aabb) {};
00052     AABB &operator = (const AABB &aabb) {};
00053 
00054 public:
00055         AABB () {}
00056     virtual ~AABB () {ClearBB(m_BBox);}
00057         
00058         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059         //  Set Methods
00060         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061         void SetMaxX(const int & tempIndex, const GLdouble &tempX) {m_BBox[tempIndex].max.x = tempX;}
00062         void SetMinX(const int & tempIndex, const GLdouble &tempX) {m_BBox[tempIndex].min.x = tempX;}
00063         void SetMaxY(const int & tempIndex, const GLdouble &tempY) {m_BBox[tempIndex].max.y = tempY;}
00064         void SetMinY(const int & tempIndex, const GLdouble &tempY) {m_BBox[tempIndex].min.y = tempY;}
00065         void SetMaxZ(const int & tempIndex, const GLdouble &tempZ) {m_BBox[tempIndex].max.z = tempZ;}
00066         void SetMinZ(const int & tempIndex, const GLdouble &tempZ) {m_BBox[tempIndex].min.z = tempZ;}
00067         void SetNoBoundingBoxes(const int & tempSize);
00068 
00069         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070         //  Get Methods
00071         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072         GLdouble GetMaxX (const int & tempIndex) {return m_BBox[tempIndex].max.x;}
00073         GLdouble GetMinX (const int & tempIndex) {return m_BBox[tempIndex].min.x;}
00074         GLdouble GetMaxY (const int & tempIndex) {return m_BBox[tempIndex].max.y;}
00075         GLdouble GetMinY (const int & tempIndex) {return m_BBox[tempIndex].min.y;}
00076         GLdouble GetMaxZ (const int & tempIndex) {return m_BBox[tempIndex].max.z;}
00077         GLdouble GetMinZ (const int & tempIndex) {return m_BBox[tempIndex].min.z;}
00078         int GetNoBoundingBoxes () {return m_NoOfBoxes;}
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
00082 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
